PluginServiceProvider

class PluginServiceProvider extends AbstractServiceProvider (View source)

Populates the plugin's IoC container.

Properties

protected array $provides A list of object keys stored in the IoC container.
protected ContainerInterface $container The IoC container.
protected ConsoleApp|WebApp $craft The Craft application.
protected BasePlugin $plugin The plugin instance.
